docblock.description: Generic data formatting and manipulation utilities
Transform an array into a string of options for a 'select input'.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Array of strings to form into options, if key-value pairs are used, then the key will be the value and the value will be the text.

docblock.description: Get the difference between two dates RESULT FORMAT: '%y Year %m Month %d Day %h Hours %i Minute %s Seconds' => 1 Year 3 Month 14 Day 11 Hours 49 Minute 36 Seconds '%y Year %m Month %d Day' => 1 Year 3 Month 14 Days '%m Month %d Day' => 3 Month 14 Day '%d Day %h Hours' => 14 Day 11 Hours '%d Day' => 14 Days '%h Hours %i Minute %s Seconds' => 11 Hours 49 Minute 36 Seconds '%i Minute %s Seconds' => 49 Minute 36 Seconds '%h Hours => 11 Hours '%a Days => 468 Days

docblock.long-description:
This package should be used for all security features
PHP version 7

docblock.description: PBKDF2 key derivation function as defined by RSA's PKCS #5: https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2898.txt Test vectors can be found here: https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc6070.txt

tag.name: param
tag.description: The hash algorithm to use. Recommended: SHA256

tag.name: param
tag.description: A salt that is unique to the password.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Iteration count. Higher is better, but slower. Recommended: At least 1000.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The length of the derived key in bytes.

tag.name: param
tag.description: If true, the key is returned in raw binary format. Hex encoded otherwise.

tag.name: return
tag.description: A $keyLength-byte key derived from the password and salt.

docblock.description: Compare the given password and salt with the given hash

tag.name: param
tag.description: The salt to use for the comparison
